name: Eggless Waffles with Cherry Sauce (Vegan)
description: These vegan waffles with cherry sauce are not only super delicious but also really easy to make! Sprinkle them with a little bit of powdered sugar and cinnamon and you're good to go. They're one of my all-time favorite vegan breakfast recipes!
recipeIngredient: 2 cups all-purpose flour (You could also use whole wheat flour)
4 tablespoons of the syrup the cherries are in

recipeInstructions.text: For the waffles, combine all ingredients in a medium-sized bowl and stir well with a wooden spoon. Lightly grease a waffle iron and make six waffles.
recipeInstructions.name: For the waffles, combine all ingredients in a medium-sized bowl and stir well with a wooden spoon. Lightly grease a waffle iron and make six waffles.

recipeInstructions.text: In the meantime, make the cherry sauce. Drain the cherries. Keep some of the syrup the cherries are in as you'll need it later on. Transfer the cherries to a small pot and heat them up. Combine the corn starch with two tablespoons of water and add them to the cherries together with the syrup. Cook for about 3 minutes or until it thickens up.

Transfer the cherries to a small pot and heat them up. Combine the corn starch with two tablespoons of water and add them to the cherries together with the syrup. Cook for about 3 minutes or until it thickens up.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the waffles with the cherry sauce and sprinkle with cinnamon and powdered sugar. If you want you can also add some maple syrup.
